profile-description: I am a Backend Developer specialized in Python with 4 years of experience in developing robust applications and services. I have experience in:
optimization: Optimization: Designing scalable architectures and optimizing server performance.
location-description: I reside in Monza, Italy. I am open to opportunities that require travel and am also comfortable working remotely, leveraging collaborative tools to maintain optimal communication and productivity. Additionally, I am flexible with hybrid or on-site work arrangements.
interests-description: I am passionate about staying updated with the latest technologies and trends in software development. I also enjoy physical activities like trekking, calisthenics, and floor acrobatics, which help me stay fit and relieve stress. For me, programming is not just a profession but a form of art. I love creating elegant and efficient solutions that solve complex problems and improve people's lives.
education-degree-description: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Programming at the University of Quilmes. During my studies, I am building a solid foundation in software development, algorithms, data structures, and design patterns. My education covers both fundamental theory and practical applications in various programming languages and technologies, including the use of design patterns to create more efficient and maintainable solutions. This comprehensive training is preparing me to tackle complex challenges in the field of computer science.
education-coder-description: In the Backend course with Coderhouse, I learned to develop modern applications with Node.js and MongoDB. I focused on server-side JavaScript, using asynchronous techniques to enhance performance. I acquired skills in service communication, managing distributed processes, and handling large volumes of data. I also prepared for deployment across different web platforms, ensuring scalable and robust solutions. This training has equipped me to build and manage effective backend applications in today's web environment.
backend-banza-description: At Banza, I develop and maintain backend services using Python and FastAPI, continuously optimizing the performance and scalability of the application. I work with AWS Lambda for serverless functions and manage MySQL databases to ensure data integrity. I use Elasticsearch to enhance search and analytics, and Redis to manage caches and improve performance. I implement secure authentication using JWT and conduct testing with Postman. I collaborate with the team using Bitbucket and Git for version control and code management.
backend-leafnoise-description: As a Backend Developer at Leafnoise for 3 years, I gained solid experience in backend development, working with Python and Flask to create and maintain a robust and scalable application. I learned and applied agile methodologies such as Scrum and project management tools like Jira. I collaborated with national clients, including ANSES and several municipalities, on the creation and maintenance of Moorea, an application for digitizing procedures. This experience allowed me to delve into custom solution implementation. I used MongoDB for managing non-relational data and Docker for containerizing the application, improving portability and consistency.
creative-ideas: I focus on writing clean code by adhering to best programming practices.
creative-ideas-description: My name is Agust√≠n Martilotta, and I am a passionate Backend Developer with 4 years of experience creating technological solutions that enhance the efficiency and functionality of businesses. Since a young age, I have had a great fascination with technology and programming, which led me to specialize in Python and develop skills in frameworks such as FastAPI and Flask. I take pride in my ability to solve complex problems and my commitment to continuous improvement.
get-in-touch: Get in touch with me to get to know each other better!
